text: Dansbandskampen was a Swedish television show. It was created by Peter Settman and his production company Baluba. Peter Settman was also the show host. It was broadcast over Sveriges Television, with season one airing October–December 2008. The show was a music competition with dansbands. There were talks of spreading the concept outside Sweden, with a disco/folk music version in Poland and a country music version in the USA.Aftonbladet 10 February 2009 -Nu vill USA ha Settmans succé ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Music media Category:Swedish music Category:Television Category:2008 establishments in Europe Category:2000s establishments in Sweden
title: Dansbandskampen
